reviews.review:
Half Life 1 is essentially a 1990s onslaught of glitches and bad mechanics, you feel like you're just surviving.

Half Life 2, on the other hand, makes you feel like the enemies are surviving YOU. Bit of an average FPS, except the vehicle missions are fun and you can pick up items. Some confusing parts, but it came out in 2004 so what can you really expect.

The moment when you put on the suit from HL1 and that shitty music plays for half a second is pretty based.

6/10

[h1] Half Life 2 [/h1]

Half Life 2 is just fabulous. Good story, good mechanics, good fights, everything is just amazing. Gordon Freeman is the coolest scientist in the world. This game is the perfect second part. You should try it even if several decades go by. This game was definitely ahead of its time.
best played with a barf bag
This is still to this day, one of the best games ever created.
ay yo its the freeman. pretty good game btw use sv_cheats 1 + noclip + notarget to cheese the game fun game

I was like 2 or 4 when I played this game for the first time.

Good game of course

Holds up super well even in 2021. I'd argue that this game was pivotal in shaping FPS as a genre, and its post-soviet aesthetic  and bold writing makes it a game that absolutely stands out among its peers. I'm not usually one for muted, drab colors, but in this case it really helps sell the dreary hopelessness of Combine Earth. The storyline is strong and creates a powerful sense of urgency that drives the player forward. The story beats hit one after the other, so there's never an idle moment of gameplay, although the characters themselves leave something to be desired in the base game. Alyx is an impeccable character, especially for her time. A classic, influential game that every FPS enthusiast should play!

Also, the OSIPR has the best sound design ever and I'm still sad they changed it in the episodes. I use it almost exclusively just because I like how it sounds
There really isn't much to be said about the game as everyone already knows exactly how good it is. Can't believe such a good game engine came out when it did.

One of the greatest and most revolutionary first person games ever made with great characters and an equally great story. An amazing follow-up to the first one!

This game saved my life.

I am 27.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and adopted our son together. They are now both 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I found myself lost and miserable. I was self destructive. I got so mad one day from everything spiraling out of my control that I punched some concrete in a moment of overwhelming emotion. That caused me to break my 5th metacarpal in my right hand... my working hand... my games hand.. the hand that I held and carried my children to bed with.. The hand I desperately needed to make sure I could continue to provide.

After learning of the severity of my self-inflicted damage, I was borderline suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man with no history of depression or anxiety. I have never had fits of rage, or been one to break down and cry, but I was in a low spot that just really buried me from being able to see the light on the other side.

Having nothing better to do, I searched for a game I could play, ONE HANDED while I recovered. I somehow stumbled upon this game and read some of the reviews. I decided that it had to be worth a shot... I must admit, I didn't beat the game, or play nearly as long as some of you. In fact, I may have only played this game a day or two.. With that being said, after doing so, I had a new found joy and hope for life. I was able to put behind me the pain and suffering that had been cast over me. I was able to experience other peoples joy and happiness. I was able to see the fruits of my "labor". I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ minutes to this music long enough to realize that I was going to be okay.

After coming to that realization, I turned the game off, and I went back to work. It hurt my hand like hell but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so damn sorry for myself, and I became the father I needed to be in that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving as.

Today, I am close friend with my kids mother. We don't fight, or argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents, and friends.

I now have 3 kids. My third child is, wait for it, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my own separation, and we just stumbled in to each others life unexpectedly. We have been in a relationship for a year now, and are very happy together.

Moral of the story, you never know what life holds in store for you, and if I would have given up when all the odds were stacked against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you

This game took a crowbar to my preconceptions of what video games could be and obliterated them. This is one of the best games ever made, and I really don't throw that around lightly. 

With level design, progression, storytelling, and world building that is still revolutionary by today's standards, you owe it to yourself to experience the entire Half-Life universe. Play the game who's waves are still rippling through the industry to this day.
This game is really good if you are going to buy this game i recommend you to buy it

From looking at my times it seems this one was shorter than the first, and there was some jank in a few parts, but overall I liked it more than the first, the characters and story just seemed better this time around.

Eğer eski oyun motorlarının tadını almak ve nostalji yapmak istiyorsanız oynayabileceğiniz en iyi oyun. Serinin en iyi oyunu diyebiliriz. Oyunun içi hakkında konuşursak oyun yaşattığı o aksiyon miktarıyla , arada sırada karşımıza çıkan minik puzzlelar ile sizi kendinize çekiyor. Serinin birinci oyununu da oynamış biri olarak ikinci oyunda daha fazla eğlendim. Ancak hikaye konusunda güzel olduğu yerler de var kötü olduğu yerler de var. Tüm hikayede koskocaman evreni değiştirmeye çalışan tek kişi biz varız. "Gordon combinelarla savaş , gordon yaratıkları öldür  , gordon helikopteri bunla patlatabilirsin..." diye gidiyor ve kimsenin bizim dışımızda bir şey yapmaması biraz oyunu sinir bozucu hale sokuyor , aynı hissi Metro serisinde de yaşamıştım ama orada en azından yardımcı adam tarzı birileri geliyordu , yalnız hissetmiyordunuz yani. Bunda ise yalnız hissettiğiniz yer çok fazla o yüzden oyum 8,2/10
its a fun game survival and shooting bad guys the chapters just get crasy

E um jogo que é melhor que a sequência que melhora todos os aspectos, como história, jogabilidade e engine, e o jogo mostra um universo maravilhoso com ótimos personagens campanha e jogabilidade

A campanha deixa você  interessado do inicio até o fim, com ótimos personagens e história, o vilão da história e bem feito e construído, sendo até um pouco genérico mas e bem feito.

O jogo apresenta alguns pequenos problemas, como: História clichê e e falta a construção de alguns personagens mas foram concertados no jogos seguintes e o jogo apresenta uma falha brusca de textura, com alguns mapas nem tendo sombra, mas que foi resolvido no mod feito pelos desenvolvedores da Valve.

Mesmo o HL2 ter passado por uma produção conturbada o jogo conseguiu ser muito bom, que superou o primeiro e que não deixou de passar uma energia positiva ao jogadores.

Nem dá para acreditar que esse é um jogo lançado em 2004! Eu joguei a primeira vez em 2013 e fiquei impressionado com a qualidade do jogo. A historia do jogo é muito boa, a mecânica é maravilhosa e a qualidade gráfica é muito boa(Bem a frente dos outros jogas da época). Incrível como a valve deu atenção aos mínimos detalhes desse jogo.
